sub_title: Managing Director / Product & Validation Manager Sigma Pharmaceuticals | Royal Canin & Beaphar MBA | Veterinarian, BVSc Veterinary Medicine & Animal Science  Visiting Lecturer Masters of Veterinary
summary:
Fluent English Managing Director with an MBA and extensive experience in the Pet Food global technical & marketing, Veterinary Medicine & Animal Science industry who develops high-impact strategies that enhance revenue streams and generate profitable growth and operation of a company. A results-driven, capable to develop, motivate and lead high-performance teams in order to maximize company profitability and efficiency. 

Proven track record in science & business management, building high value, strong problem-solving skills, and multicultural handler, long-lasting international partnerships in EMEA and Asian countries. Tactically astute in managing a complex supply chain. Innovative sales and marketing skills, pragmatic, hard-working, approachable. Able to work across multiple cultural environments,

Highly capable in leadership at both the operational and strategic level, pragmatic, energetic, and smart business minded. Expertise & achievements lie in the areas of being able to deliver rapid and consistent growth for industries: from revenues to bottom line by leading multifunctional teams and ownership of results. Wide experience in Project management, having a decisive influence at the board level, going to root-cause problem-solving in business restructuring & delivering a crystal-clear communication style.
